lead_paragraph: Gil Hodges, Ron Santo, Tony Oliva and Jim Kaat are among the 27 players on next year’s veterans committee ballot for the Hall of Fame announced yesterday. The umpire Doug Harvey; Walter O’Malley, the former Dodgers owner; and Marvin Miller, the former union leader, are among 15 managers, executives and umpires on the “composite” ballot. No one received the required 75 percent in the first two votes by the committee, in 2003 and 2005.
